ComicInfo.Summary:
First issue to feature 'glamourpuss Magazine Club' (who has time to read books anymore?) where glamourpuss reviews the latest issue of Bitch ('feminist response to pop culture') magazine. In the History of Photorealism in the Comics section, an examination of Alex Raymond's 1954 'Crusher' Twickam storyline and how it relates to Stan Drake's The Heart of Juliet Jones."
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-13/4000-212996/
ComicInfo.Characters: Jack Katz,Desmond,Rip Kirby,Stan Drake,Hal Foster,Sylvan Byck,Alex Raymond,Ward Greene,"Crusher" Twickham
